DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of V710 in Japanese male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: V710 Clinical Study in Healthy Male Japanese Subjects (V710-006) (COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Generally Good Physical Health Received V710 Vaccine, Any Other Investigational S. Aureus Vaccine, Or Investigational S. Aureus Antibodies Before Temperature Of Equal/Greater Than 100.4 Degrees F(38 Degrees C) Within The Past 48 Hours
